title: Maven Executor
description: The Maven executor is used to run Maven phases and goals.

phase.description: The Maven lifecycle phase to execute (e.g., 'compile', 'test', 'package', 'install').

args.description: The arguments to pass to the Maven command.

excludeDependsOn.description: If true, the tasks will not execute their dependsOn tasks. If false, the task will execute its dependsOn tasks.

__unparsed__.description: Additional arguments to pass to the Maven command (automatically populated by Nx).
